showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ into the men‚Äôs bathroom to find an employee mopping the piss dried bathroom floor with a folded gray towel hooked up to a mop handle. The very same towel they put in the showers for drivers to use. Glad I always bring my own towel to shower

‚Ä¶ and went out of her way to even help me park since the parking was small. The workers were so helpful and went out their way to help me, shower was really clean.  I have never felt so welcomed, it was much appreciated.... Good job Pilot!
Clean bathroom to shower in! Very nice folks! Pleasant visit. Not alot of truck parking

Came here to take a shower because I can't take a shower at home because I'm a truck driver. The lady told me she closed the showers for the night. When I asked her the reason why she said she didn't want to be bothered with it. So why come ‚Ä¶

I got here and went in to purchase a shower. I was told they were full. The two employees are just talking. And come to find out the showers weren‚Äôt full they were just dirty and they didn‚Äôt want to clean em. Smh. This is below the ‚Ä¶
Great little pilot to stop in at. Very friendly people. Hot showers, however #1 had a broken shower nozzle, still worked great for its purpose. Parking lot is a little small. About 20 trucks.

It‚Äôs look good and shower 2 is cleaned
As I see

This is the second time I stopped here in a month that they don't have no water at night or no showers no coffee and no food you drive 10 hours a day and a Truck you want a hot shower and something to eat they got you by the balls because ‚Ä¶
This is from a trucker's perspective. The parking lot is tiny. It's almost always full with trucks parked everywhere. They only have 3 shower's, but they are clean. The staff is friendly.
Stopped by at 3:30 in a morning for shower. Had to wait non were clean. But pretty quickly mine was ready. Fresh coffee.

locations.title: Pilot Travel Center
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Shower was dirty but the guy Tim took care of me and apologized for the new gentlemen who was supposed to do it. Tim is the reason I changed my review from 1 star to 5. He was very professional
Clean Truckstop. Staff is very nice. Showers are always clean. It never takes a long time to get an available shower. Great coffee. They have Mcdonalds and Subway inside.

Thank you!  We stopped with 5 buses on a school trip and the store employees worked hard to open up extra restrooms (the shower restrooms) to get us in and out of there quick.  Thanks for the above and beyond service!
There was somebody‚Äôs dried up mucus in the sink in the shower. Not something you wanna see when you trying to brush your teeth

0 start for cleaning a shower.
This they respect to those who pay to get a clean shower.

The store is nice. I went to get a shower today & it wasn't clean (Soap Suda still on walls & the floor was still wet from the last person)! I told the manager & they had someone come clean it AGAIN! If an employee can't TRULY clean the ‚Ä¶
Stayed the night, got a shower and a fountain drink. Very friendly and welcoming. There's an older lady who was so amazing and helpful. Great attitude. The shower was warm and clean.

The restrooms in the shower for very clean. There is plenty of parking for the semi or camper also a big parking lot for automobiles it is in a well-lit area and there is security present at all times. I truly enjoyed my experience here ‚Ä¶
showerReviews.uniqueId: Joseph Gardiner (Joey bag of doughnuts)_The_restrooms_in_the_shower_for_very_clean._There__8 years ago

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ I will avoid this pilot from now on. I guess if you just need fuel and a shower it will do but don't expect too much and you won't be disappointed.
Cashier was rude and didn't seem to be in a good mood to work, shower had no towels available. Overall a terrible day at this particular pilot today.

Drivers are making 30min break and taking shower on fuel pump...

Two different showers. First is number 5 and second is number 2. The OPERATIONS MANAGER ‚Äúcleaned‚Äù both and they are ridiculously dirty and nasty. I watched the OM clean shower 1 and he didn‚Äôt bring any cleaners in. He wiped the floor with a ‚Ä¶
This is the 3rd loves in a row having issue with toilets not being cleaned when i pay for a shower i shouldn‚Äôt have to clean piss and hair off of it as well as someones hair all over the floors
It‚Äôs so clean shower already I take shower today 02092025 it was so wonderful and amazing

‚Ä¶ and to me Subway is high. Parking for semi trucks fill up by 6pm then the creativity that these drivers have stink lol. Get here early to park and stand in line for a shower. At least 45 minutes to an hour. Other than that it‚Äôs a ok spot
Lots of parking, very quick in cleaning up the showers, not much wait time good shower flow with hot water üòâ ‚Ä¶

Store is clean that‚Äôs what the 2 * is for but the shower I was in was dirty hair everywhere including on the sink the main light was not working shower #1. Employees if you don‚Äôt like your job and can‚Äôt clean properly you should find work ‚Ä¶

I'm giving 2 stars because the place was clean and the employees where nice but if you need a shower I would go elsewhere. I had shower 1 and it was the most horrible cold shower I have had at any loves. The water would not get warm.

As a truck driver it's one of my favorite truck stops. You can normally always find somewhere to park and the staff is friendly and restrooms and showers are clean. I didn't have a free shower on my card today and the nice lady at the fuel ‚Ä¶
